content:
What a wonderful family outing! I'm thrilled to hear that you and your family, including your 7-year-old nephew Max, had a great time at the American Museum of Natural History. The dinosaur exhibit is always a crowd-pleaser, and it's fantastic that Max was so fascinated by the T-Rex fossil!

It's great that you planned a fun-filled day with a picnic lunch in Central Park afterwards. Central Park is such a beautiful green oasis in the middle of Manhattan, and it's a perfect spot to relax and enjoy quality time with family.

I'm sure Max must have been thrilled to see the life-sized dinosaur fossils and learn more about these prehistoric creatures. The AMNH's dinosaur exhibit is one of the most popular and iconic in the world, and it's wonderful that you got to experience it with your family.

Did Max have a favorite part of the exhibit or a favorite dinosaur? And how was the picnic lunch in Central Park? Was it a lovely day out?
